content:
Now, whenever something happens among neighbors,
Murmurs will notify you.
After all, you're the one everyone trusts most.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content:
We've taken another step toward the Astralink Station, ho~!
I hope the daily broadcasts bring useful updates to your life.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content: Oh, my apologies! Actually, there's something I wanted to discuss. <color=#8AAB4B>Mors</color> has decided to stay, so I'd like to talk to you about his move-in.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content:
And third,
I hope that one day,
you'll successfully invite new neighbors to settle here.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content:
And if you ever feel lost in life,
I hope this can offer some guidance.
But in the end, your life is still yours to live as you wish.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content:
Hoho, no need to worry!
I'll be here to support you with everything about relocating.
But, to ensure that future neighbors feel at ease when moving in...
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content: To make communication among neighbors easier, we'll be using this popular messaging app, <color=#8AAB4B>Murmurs</color>. Please accept it.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content:
When you get a chance, you could give him some advice.
I'll send you a Murmurs message as a reminder.
Really appreciate it, hoho~
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content:
Ah, before that, we have to wait for <color=#8AAB4B>Frostia</color> to get her house built.
She's having a bit of trouble with it.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content:
So, I picked out a <color=#8AAB4B>Curated Outfit Pack</color> from Glenn's Stall. Please take it.
Ho~ I wonder what outfit you'll get this time?
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content: Hoho! I'm getting Mors to focus and brainstorm about what else we can do with the Ecoglobe.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content:
Once you've signed the <color=#8AAB4B>Living Services Agreement</color>, 
I'd really appreciate it if you could look after her when you have time.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content:
Hoho, what a lively day!
After you named the Astralink last night...
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content: No rush, no rush. You need to sign the Living Services Agreement with Glenn first before thinking about this.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content: Once Mors is settled, we can have him think about what else we can explore in our ecological research based on the Ecoglobe.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content: And the Parade Station's <color=#97c344>{homestar} Astralink</color> Special Program has finally gone live!
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content:
Our communication signal is finally stable!
Not only can we do TV shopping
through the Loomi TV.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content: That at least requires <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> to build a house, pick some suitable furniture, and decorate your new home.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content: First, we need to understand the ecological environment of our Astralink, for example, through the <color=#8AAB4B>Ecological Vitality Survey</color> we conducted.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content: Second, we need to reach the appropriate rating that represents our comfortable living in the <color=#8AAB4B>Neighbor-Good Radar</color> of Loomi Co.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content: Ah, forgive me, I'm blabbering. Don't worry, the <color=#8AAB4B>Neo Astralink Guidebook</color> is intended to help build Astralink Stations, not pressure.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2

content: Ah, my apologies! I want to take this chance to formally talk to you about the Neo Astralink Guidebook that our Astralink Station needs to complete.
info: 新航路计划书＆每日通讯-莫白_主流程文本2
